Key Match Events: Jamal Murray had 21 points and 9 assists, Russell Westbrook added 19 points and 8 assists as the Nuggets routed the Clippers 126-103
Pre-Game Insights: Kawhi Leonard was not available for the Clippers due to helping his family deal with wildfires
Nikola Jokic was out for the Nuggets due to an illness
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denver took control with a 20-3 run in the first quarter and led 55-30 late in the second before Los Angeles cut it to 16 at halftime
The Nuggets used another spurt midway through the third quarter to put it away
Others: Norman Powell scored 30 points to finish with a 27.6 average in the Clippers' four games against the Nuggets
James Harden had 16 points and Ivica Zubac added 10 for the Clippers
